patthana17.25:1.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.25:2.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana17.25:3.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
